select count(*) from ( select s.*,u.xm from t_store s left join t_sys_user u on s.user_id = u.user_id ) su left join ( select b.*,t.lxmc from t_book b left join t_type t on b.type_id = t.type_id ) tb on su.isbn = tb.isbn
where tb.sm like '%${dim}%' or tb.zz like '%${dim}%'

select su.id,tb.isbn,tb.sm,tb.cbsmc,tb.cbrq,tb.zz,tb.lxmc,tb.tsdl,su.xm uname,su.wz,su.sh,su.rksj,su.status,tb.picture,tb.jj,(SELECT u.xm FROM t_store s,t_sys_user u,t_borrow b WHERE u.user_id = b.user_id AND b.s_id=s.id AND b.jyzt!=2 AND s.id=#{id}) jyxm from ( select s.*,u.xm from t_store s left join t_sys_user u on s.user_id = u.user_id where s.id = #{id}
) su, ( select b.*,t.lxmc from t_book b left join t_type t on b.type_id = t.type_id ) tb where su.isbn = tb.isbn

select su.id,tb.isbn,tb.sm,tb.cbsmc,tb.cbrq,tb.zz,tb.lxmc,tb.tsdl,su.xm uname,su.wz,su.sh,su.rksj,su.status,tb.jj,tb.picture from ( select s.*,u.xm from t_store s left join t_sys_user u on s.user_id = u.user_id ) su left join ( select b.*,t.lxmc from t_book b left join t_type t on b.type_id = t.type_id ) tb on su.isbn = tb.isbn order by su.status

SELECT temp.id,temp.jyrq,temp.ghrq,temp.isbn,temp.xm,tb.sm,tb.tsdl,tb.zz,tb.cbsmc, temp.`status`,temp.jyzt,temp.jhghrq,temp.xjrq, temp.lxfs,temp.bm,temp.dz,temp.user_id userId FROM (SELECT b.id id,b.jyrq,b.ghrq, b.`status`,b.jyzt,b.jhghrq,b.xjrq, s.isbn,u.xm,u.lxfs,u.bm,u.dz,u.user_id FROM t_borrow b LEFT JOIN t_store s ON b.s_id = s.id LEFT JOIN t_sys_user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE 1=1
AND u.xm LIKE '%${user}%'
AND b.jyrq >= '${startTime}'
AND b.jyrq <= '${endTime}'
) temp LEFT JOIN t_book tb ON temp.isbn = tb.isbn
WHERE tb.sm LIKE '%${dim}%' OR tb.zz LIKE '%${dim}%'
ORDER BY temp.jyrq DESC

SELECT temp.id,temp.jyrq,temp.ghrq,temp.isbn,temp.xm,tb.sm,tb.tsdl,tb.zz,tb.cbsmc,tb.jj,tb.picture,temp.`status`,temp.jyzt,temp.jhghrq,temp.xjrq, temp.lxfs,temp.bm,temp.dz,temp.user_id userId FROM (SELECT b.id id,b.jyrq,b.ghrq, b.`status`,b.jyzt,b.jhghrq,b.xjrq, s.isbn,u.xm,u.lxfs,u.bm,u.dz,u.user_id FROM t_borrow b LEFT JOIN t_store s ON b.s_id = s.id LEFT JOIN t_sys_user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE b.id = #{id} ) temp LEFT JOIN t_book tb ON temp.isbn = tb.isbn
